column2: My liege, a third horde has been sent from the east by the terrible Khagan of the Mongols. This one led by his second son himself, has allegedly been declared to conquer the Hindus and all the way to the Indian Ocean!
Time for the Infidel to suffer!
column3: Il est temps que les infidèles souffrent !
column4: Ungläubige, die Zeit des Leidens ist gekommen!
column6: ¡Es hora de que sufran los infieles!

column2: The great [Root.GetTitledName] and all [Root.GetHerHis] vassals have converted and embraced the Hindu faith!
The great [Root.GetTitledName] and all [Root.GetHerHis] vassals have converted and embraced the Buddhist faith!
The great [Root.GetTitledName] and all [Root.GetHerHis] vassals have converted and embraced the Jain faith!
